results.title: Spun out
results.brief_description: Serious illness not only can bring a family closer together but it can make them stronger and more willing to accept alternative options when the traditional way is just not working. Life can be tough but the joy is in seeing your loved ones recovering.

results.title: Sprout wings and fly
results.creator_credit: Flower Films, Alice Gerrand, Cece Conway and Les Blank
results.brief_description: A touching tribute to Appalachian culture in the form of a profile of the legendary mountain fiddler, Tommy Jarrell - “I eat when I’m hungry, I drink when I’m dry. If I get to feeling much better I’m going to sprout wings and fly”.

results.title: Springtime in the Rockies
results.creator_credit: William Le Baron, Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation and Irving Cummings
results.brief_description: Betty Grable abandons Broadway fame and takes off for the beautiful Canadian Rockies after she has a falling out with her leading man (John Payne). All manner of complications arise when Payne pursues her with a highly unlikely secretary (Carmen Miranda) in tow. In the Rockies, Grable meets up with a former dance partner (Cesar Romero) and decides to teach philandering Payne a lesson in the art of two-timing. The two women lead the men a merry dance in this colourful musical. Carmen Miranda proves to be a fine comedienne with her fractured English and Grable and Romero set the screen ablaze with some wonderful dance routines. Several hit songs are featured in this tuneful showcase.

results.title: Springtime in a small town = Xiao cheng zhi chun
results.creator_credit: Beijing Film Studio, China Film Group Corporation, Bill Kong, Li Xiaowan, Ting Yatming and Tian Zhuangzhuang
results.brief_description: Finely crafted romantic drama about a young married woman who dutifully cares for her sickly husband, but whose feelings for a former beau reawakens her desire. Set amid the post-WW2 ruins of a small town, this film exquisitely portrays Yuwens longing, which contrasts with her efficient but cold care of her ailing and ill-tempered husband. Director Tian Zhuangzuang (The Blue kite), part of the fifth generation of Chinese filmmakers observes his protagonists through doorways and windows, providing an apt metaphor for their inability to connect. A film that allows the tension to build in a languid but effective manner, as the three angst ridden players make their choices. Cast includes Hu Jingfan, Wu Jun, Xin Baiqing, Ye Xiaokeng and Lu Sisi.

results.title: Springboard techniques: the forward and backward lifts
results.brief_description: A prerequisite for skilful diving is a thorough understanding of the functions of the springboard in diving. Stop-motion and slow motion are used in this film to give a detailed analysis of lifts, tucks, somersaults, and other types of diving movements, both in training for diving, and in actual dives by experts.
